content:
It sounds like you're on a roll with your Mexican-inspired cooking! Chicken fajitas are a classic dish, and I'm sure your addition of cumin gave it a fantastic flavor boost.

I'm thrilled to hear that you found a great recipe on YouTube and that it turned out amazing. YouTube can be a fantastic resource for cooking inspiration and tutorials. There are so many talented cooks and chefs sharing their recipes and techniques online.

And congratulations on buying "The Spice Bible" cookbook! That's a great resource to have in your kitchen. It's always exciting to explore new spices and seasonings, and having a comprehensive guide can help you make the most of your flavor experiments.

What did you think of the chicken fajita recipe you made? Was there anything in particular that stood out to you, like a specific spice or technique that made it special?

Also, have you tried any other recipes from "The Spice Bible" yet? I'd love to hear about your experiences with the book and any discoveries you've made so far!
